ContinuousBIT_System

Continuous Built-In Test flags for system information

Bits 0-31 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

RESPONSE_OFFSET

The offset of the 0 position of the value represented by this object in the overall BIT response Value: 0 bits

Bitmasks
GENERAL_FLAGS

0xFF000000 - Bitmask for general system flags (bits 0-7)

PROCESS_FLAGS

0x0000FFFF - Bitmask for system process flags (bits 16-31)

flags
uint32 flags() const

Gets the value of the system flags (bits 0-31)

Returns
uint32

Value of the system flags
